name: Surive The Storm!
description:
Actionpacked Platformer Game set in the mountains!

Important!: Takes about 20 seconds to load!

Story:

You were wandering alone in the mountains, when suddenly it started to rain and a huge thunderstorm appeared.Now you have to get back as fast as you can to your hotel to surive the storm.But watch out, that won't be so easy because nature has some traps for you which you have to be careful of.

Genre: Platformer

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys To run

Space, Z, W or Up arrow key to jump.

Controller Friendly!

Playingtime: Max 5 min

Version: 1.0

Orignal Release Date: 7.3.22

Made by Untitled Games © 2022

Thankyou for playing :)
